content.rendered:
beauty bar in rosedale village | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in rosedale village, austin. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and special treatments for eyebrows and eyelashes. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up
beauty bar in rosedale village | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 4800 burnet road ste 440 austin, tx
  • 512-520-8310
  • rosedalevillage@thetenspot.com
  • @x.atxrosedale

  • licensed to serve alcohol

Hours

mon.: closed

tue. – wed: 10:00 am – 7:00 pm

thu.: 10:00 am – 9:00 pm

fri.: 10:00 am – 8:00 pm

sat. - sun: 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

I love seeing myne for pedicures! She pays such special attention to her work and is also a joy to talk to. I always feel at peace with her and the whole staff is lovely. I have a membership because I am such a frequent visitor!
Kelcie Smith
1719329533
I got the lash lift and tint and it was great!The service was amazing super clean and Jasmine did a great job :))My lashes curled so beautifully and naturally, and they lasted the promised 8 weeks.I would definitely recommend and I will go again.
Paula Becher
1715298676
Came here with my wife & the ladies in our bridal parties to get some simple gel nails done before our wedding! It was both of our first time actually getting a manicure - they did a great job and we’ll definitely be back 🙂
Angela Martillotti
1714703631
Fantastic service! I recently had an appointment with Mikayla for a brow and nose wax and it was first time ever getting waxed. I was pretty nervous but she made me feel so comfortable. She was efficient and had me laughing the whole time! Plus the... entire salon is neat and clean and the beds were super comfy. I definitely will book again with The Ten Spot and Mikayla!read more
James Madison
1703893399
My tech Anitra is awesome! She is a professional tech that does an excellent job on my pedicures. I love the shop. The atmosphere is so chill. This is my favorite mail shop.
Deidra Blakemore
1699253584
amazing experience here!! me and my boyfriend came in for pedicures, everyone who spoke to us was so sweet and welcoming! Myne and Cheyenne preformed our pedicures and did a phenomenal job! will definitely be back!
Rhys Dodds
1694144564
I had a BIAB infill done today by Anitra and it was by the far the best manicure I have ever had. Her attention to detail was incredible, she understood exactly what I wanted and now every time I’m in Austin I won’t be going to anyone else. Thank... you Anitra!read more
Briar Hikuroa
1693094230
I love this place! I’d never been waxed before and so I was super nervous but Mikayla (sorry if I’m spelling your name wrong, girl!) is so funny and nice it was a breeze. Jennifer the owner is super sweet and understanding. I was recommended to go... here by my sister and I am so glad I did! I never felt judged or embarrassed or anything negative. Definitely go here to get waxed!read more
Monica Garza
1681834526
Rashana totally nailed it!I ended up needing a fill while traveling and knew the ten spot was the place to go! I highly recommend Rashana for the best nails of your life!
Rebecca Chan
1676400299
I walked in knowing I needed multiple services within a week, and they worked hard to ensure I was able to get them just in time before a special event.I had my eyebrows laminated and tinted, eyelashes lifted and tinted, gel overlay and a... pedicure.I was nervous about the brows and lashes, as I had never done More than a tint before. They turned out amazing and I'm hooked.I also had acrylic nails for 20 years except for the last two and a half. I am very particular, and my gel overlay turned out beautiful. The pedicure was nice. Nothing spectacular. I could have asked for more calls and foot massage, but that's really not the purpose.I'm definitely going back.Everyone was nice and helpful. The place is clean and bright. I highly recommend.read more
Amy Baker, PharmD
1674565554
omg! Talk about amazing! I have gotten two facials so far with mikayla and I have loved every second of them! She SAVED my skin. She is incredibly knowledgeable and not judgmental at all about my basically non existent skin care regimen… the... location is super convenient and close to ut campus (for my fellow longhorns!). Jenn, the owner, is so sweet and hands on in the bar. All of staff members make me feel like a 10/10 everytime I come in! Highly recommend ☺️☺️☺️read more
sydney aelvoet
1674254704
Wonderful gem located in a great location on Burnet Road! Adorable interiors and well trained staff! The owner is hands on and the experience is polished. Leti did my nails expertly and timely. I will definitely be going here again!
Gina Lynd
1670447132
I love The Ten Spot!! I’ve always had my nails done and have been trying to find the right spot and I found it! They genuinely care about you and the health of your nails. Leti is amazing- everyone there is so kind and professional. The space is... clean and relaxing. Highly recommend!read more
Miranda J Fermin
1665686445
I was looking for a place that could take me in today for a chemical peel and immediately found The Ten Spot. Wow! First of all, booking online was easy because it explained what each service was in detail and was easy to navigate. When I entered, I... was greeted with such warm smiles and hellos which was a great feeling because I was having a bad day.Mikayla was so sweet in showing me around the space and taking care of me during the appointment. She is so knowledgeable in skincare and was really gentle the entire time.The place is also very clean! I really loved the experience there getting a chemical peel. Along with facials, they also have mani and pedicures, waxing, lashes, and brow services.10/10. Will be coming back for a facial next!!Thank youuuu 🙂read more
Carol Castro-Adolphus
1659552819
The Ten Spot is my go-to for affordable self-care! Today I got a quickie facial from Jasmin, which felt luxuriously moisturizing and relaxing. Not only did she take care of my skin, but she treated me to a soothing neck and shoulder massage, and set... me up with a handful of skin-care samples to try. I appreciate that she didn't pressure me to make a purchase right then and there, but rather encouraged me to give them a try and figure out what I like. Plus, we discussed plans for my brows for the next visit...see you soon Jasmin!read more
Sarah Spradling
1657758364
The Ten Spot is a 10/10! I was visiting from out of town for the holidays and Jenn made me feel right at home.I received the most incredible facial and eyebrow shaping. My esthetician was kind and knowledgeable; she walked me through each step and... was attentive to my specific skin needs.I also got a manicure and pedicure--there was excellent color selection. When I wasn't sure which color to get for my manicure, Jenn was attentive, kind and extremely helpful in picking out the right color based on my preferences.Clean space, kind staff, great services. What more can you ask for? Thanks Ten Spot! Can't wait to visit again.read more
Rachel Paul
1640807831
This is my new favorite nail salon and spa. Incredible service, gorgeous aesthetic, and skilled technicians. My nails are flawless. Highly highly recommend!!
Madison Rainbow
1639878107
What a fun pamper-fest for a 14 year old birthday party! The technicians were wonderful with the girls, the music was great and the bday girl felt very special! These teens could not stop looking at their beautiful nails for the rest of the... afternoon! Success and appreciation to the TEN Spot!read more
christa jane martin
1635865427
‹
›
